description: Kento Low GTX® Men. The sustainable approach shoe. Mastrotto split leather features impressive top-class quality and the highest standards of "made in Italy" sustainability. Developed by Vibram and Mammut, the sole design offers grip and minimum weight. Waterproof and breathable thanks to Gore-Tex. Optimized fit since the previous model. The Kento Low is a classic approach shoe for via ferrata, mountain hiking and much more.
name: Mammut Kento Low GTX - Mens
